content: increased yarn over needle to tighten slipped st creating a double st k knit k2tog knit two stitches together to decrease row 3 increase and short row rs *knit to 1 st before kfab knit into the front and back of stitch to sm kfab slipm kfab repeat from * 3 more times for each increase sm lh left hand knit to double st work double st making sure you k2tog the m1 use a simple backward loop to increase two strands of the double st k1 then turn sl1 and pull yarn by one over and around needle to create double st 8 sts increase = 60 mc main colour p purl row 4 short row ws purl to double st slipping sms as rh right hand you pass them work double st making sure you p2tog the slipm slip marker two strands of the double st p1 then turn bring yarn to front sl1 slip_stitch purl-wise to right needle without sl1 and pull yarn over needle to create double st working sm stitch marker row 5-8 repeat row 3 and 4 twice more 16 sts increase = sor start of round 76 st/s stitch/es ssk slip slip knit row 9 increase row rs *knit to 1 st before sm kfab slip two stitches knit-wise one at a time slipm kfab repeat from * 3 more times for each sm use left needle to knit through both stitches to knit to double st work double st making sure you k2tog the decrease two strands of the double st k2 8 sts increase = 84 special techniques row 10 ws purl to double st slipping sms as you pass german short row great video clips them work double st making sure you p2tog the two strands http //www youtube com/watch v=p6n561smzxq of the double st p2 http //www youtube com/watch v=kookdm0ybbw row 11 increase row rs *knit to 1 st before sm kfab backward loop use your thumb to create a loop slipm kfab repeat from * 3 more times for each sm knit to from yarn and place on needle end of row 8 sts increase = 92 useful link http //tutorials knitpicks com/wptutorials/loop-cast-on/ row 12 ws purl slipping sms as you pass them row 13-21 repeat row 11 and 12 five more times neckline stitch set-up 18/28/40/28/18 = 132 using cc smaller size 24 /60cm circular and a long-tail cast- on cast on 44 sts split for body and sleeves row 1 ws p1 *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 3 sts p3 knit to 1 sts before sm kfab remove sm place next 28 sts on waste yarn row 2 rs k1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 backward loop cast on 6 sts remove sm kfab knit to 1 st before sm kfab remove sm row 3-8 repeat row 1 and 2 place next 28 sts on waste yarn backward loop cast on 6 sts remove sm kfab knit to end
